article_title: NEW PRODUCT: Eco Vessel Water Bottles
article_text: Designed in the Rocky Mountains, these water bottles are made without harmful or leaching materials and chemicals, and feature a stainless steel or environmentally-friendly plastic body, eliminating the need for a water-contaminating liner and coating. Plastics found in the lids and tops are 100 percent recyclable. Vacuum seal insulation technology ensures that your water will stay cold, but the bottle won’t sweat. And a sustainable plant-based attachable filter removes giardia and cryptosporidium, transforming any water into drinking water, the manufacturer says. Available in Aqua Vessel Insulated and Aqua Vessel Ultra Light. From $12.95 to $39.95, at retailers and online.
article_summary:
Available in Aqua Vessel Insulated and Aqua Vessel Ultra Light.

Designed in the Rocky Mountains, these water bottles are made without harmful or leaching materials and chemicals, and feature a stainless steel or environmentally-friendly plastic body, eliminating the need for a water-contaminating liner and coating.
